page.title: 17CLUBS IN WEST NOTTINGHAM
page.content: In the area we found the{Clubs}to be mostly{Youth Clubs, Playgroups}and {Cubs, Scouts}and{Boys Brigade.} The{Youth Clubs}totalled 6 and were found in a range of places. They take place in Church Halls, Junior Schools and Community Centres. Only in two cases were the{Clubs}in places designated specially for their use. The{Cubs and Scouts}are based in a Church Hall. The{Boys Brigade}is organised in a different Church Hall. They generally meet at least once a week and are involved in numerous, wide ranging activities. The{Playgroups}involved mothers and toddlers. The bases for these groups to take place were again Community Centres, Infant Schools and Church Halls. There are also 6 groups for those over sixty years.
